mapper.select: SELECT M.USER_NO, ROUND(SYSDATE - M.CREATE_DATE) AS MARKET_OPEN, ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FW_ID = M.USER_NO) AS FOLLOW_COUNT, ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM SELL WHERE USER_NO = M.USER_NO ) AS SELL_COUNT, ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_NO = M.USER_NO) AS REPOTER_COUNT FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.USER_NO = #{fiId}

SELECT F.FW_ID , COUNT(FI_ID) AS SELL_COUNT , NVL(R.AVG, 0) AS AVG FROM FOLLOW F, SELL S, (SELECT AVG(REV_SCORE) AS AVG, S.USER_NO FROM REVIEW R, SELL S WHERE R.SELL_NO = S.SELL_NO GROUP BY S.USER_NO) R WHERE F.FW_ID = S.USER_NO AND F.FW_ID = R.USER_NO(+) AND F.FI_ID = #{fiId} GROUP BY F.FW_ID, R.AVG ORDER BY F.FW_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOLLOW (FI_ID, FW_ID, CREATE_DATE) VALUES (#{fiId}, #{fwId}, SYSDATE)
